subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The well-traveled veteran Juan Uribe provided a game-winning hit two days after joining the team, and the addition to the roster of Kelly Johnson and Michael Conforto have also buoyed the club.
snippet: The well-traveled veteran Juan Uribe provided a game-winning hit two days after joining the team, and the addition to the roster of Kelly Johnson and Michael Conforto have also buoyed the club.
